mn37:8.6: samupabyūḷho → samupabbūḷho (bj, pts1) | samūpabbūḷho (si) | samūpabyuḷho (s1-3, km)
mn37:14.6: suladdhaṃ te, mārisa → etthantare pāṭho syā1, sī, pā1 potthakesu
mn37:15.2: bhagavā ahu → ahunaññeva (si, km) | āhunaññeva (s1-3) | ahu taññeva (pts1), bhāsitā”ti → bhāsitā (bj) | abhāsitthāti (pts1, mr)
